hero.title: Build Professional Quotes
hero.subtitle: Block by Block
hero.description: A brutally simple quote builder for freelancers, agencies, and consultants. Compose estimates with configurable blocks. Save as templates. Export perfect PDFs.

blockSystem.title: BLOCK SYSTEM
blockSystem.description: Drag and drop configurable blocks. Header, price tables, text, and terms. Compose quotes like building with LEGO.

templates.title: TEMPLATES
templates.description: Save successful quotes as templates. Reuse proven structures. Never start from scratch again.

pdfExport.title: PDF EXPORT
pdfExport.description: Generate pixel-perfect PDFs. Swiss precision typography. Professional output every time.

swissDesign.title: SWISS DESIGN
swissDesign.description: Brutalist interface. Bold borders. Uppercase typography. No unnecessary decoration. Pure function.

blockLibrary.title: 11+ BLOCKS
blockLibrary.description: Rich block library including headers, prices, terms, FAQ, tables, timelines, contacts, discounts, payments, and signatures. Everything you need.

step1.title: ADD BLOCKS
step1.description: Start with a blank canvas. Add header blocks for company info. Price tables for line items. Text blocks for descriptions. Terms blocks for conditions.

step2.title: CONFIGURE
step2.description: Customize each block. Set fonts, adjust spacing, modify colors. Everything is configurable. Everything has purpose.

step3.title: EXPORT & REUSE
step3.description: Export to PDF or save as template. Next time, start from your template. Iterate, improve, never waste time.

benefits.title: WHY BLOKKO?
benefits.description: Stop fighting with Word templates. Stop copying and pasting from old quotes. Stop wasting time on formatting. Build quotes the way developers build software: with modular, reusable components.

finalCta.title: START BUILDING
finalCta.subtitle: BETTER QUOTES TODAY
finalCta.description: Join freelancers and agencies who stopped wasting time on formatting and started focusing on winning projects.
